text: o na prabhu! Nivu naku vastavanga rajyadhikaranni prasadincavu mariyu naku svapna nirvacana jnananni kuda prasadincavu. Nive bhumyakasalaku muladharudavu. Mariyu ihapara lokalalo nive na sanraksakudavu. Niku vidheyuniga (muslinga) unna sthitilone nannu maranimpajeyi. Mariyu nannu sadvartanulalo kalupu
